title: Are there any Rioters who would like to play with me on my 1000th Normal win?
body:
My summoner name is  {{champion:432}}'bard supp only'{{champion:432}} 

Not sure if you guys do this anymore but it's worth a shot

replies.body: I'm on now if you're ready to play :)

Usually Maraudaur jumps into many games with people for their 1000th win, but you might be a little hard to come by a Rioter with spare time over the next few days due to the OPL Split final. I'm sure one will definitely be keen for a game though! 
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
